name: Pixel Ninja Bengal #10
description: AI-generated pixel ninja cat. A Epic Bengal ninja with Sai skills.

backstory.name: Silent Hunter
backstory.origin: Born in the hidden valleys of the Eastern Digital Realm, this Bengal ninja was recognized for exceptional tracking abilities from an early age. The distinctive spotted coat pattern provides perfect camouflage during network infiltration missions.
backstory.training: Under the guidance of Master Kiyoto, Silent Hunter spent years mastering the Shadow techniques, achieving the rank of Elite after passing the Trial of Shadow.
backstory.currentRole: Now a Elite ninja, Silent Hunter specializes in the Shadow stance while wielding a Sai, channeling the power of Shadow to secure the blockchain against those who would disrupt its harmony.

special_abilities: Fork Defense - Expert at detecting and neutralizing hard fork attempts
Stealth Execution - Can operate completely undetected by security systems
Dark Web Navigation - Expert at tracking threats to their source
